description:
After finally arriving in the city of water, Arcanretia, Megumin is once again having trouble saving up for the next leg of her journey. But she may have found an unexpectedn source of help in the Religious Order of Axis.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Les fauteurs de troubles de la cité de l`eau
Troublemakers of the City of Water
水の都の迷惑教団[トラブルメーカー]
